QueryDefinition.Query: select cast(p.patient_sk AS BIGINT) AS person_id, m.encounter_id, prov.physician_id, l.ndc_code, m.med_started_dt_tm, m.med_stopped_dt_tm, m.dose_quantity, m.route_administration_id, u.unit_display, 1 as fake FROM {sc}.hf_f_medication as m JOIN {sc}.hf_f_encounter as e on e.encounter_id = m.encounter_id JOIN {sc}.hf_d_patient as p on e.patient_id = p.patient_id JOIN {sc}._chunks ch ON ch.ChunkId = {0} AND p.patient_sk = ch.PERSON_SOURCE_VALUE JOIN {sc}.hf_d_medication as l on l.medication_id = m.medication_id LEFT JOIN {sc}.hf_d_unit as u on u.unit_id = m.dose_units_id LEFT JOIN {sc}.hf_d_physician as prov on ordering_physician_id = prov.physician_id order by p.patient_sk
